statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeWorkHours WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT clock_in, clock_out FROM EmployeeWorkHours WHERE work_hours > 8;
SELECT employee_id, work_hours FROM EmployeeWorkHours WHERE overtime_eligible = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeWorkHours WHERE clock_in < '2022-01-01';
SELECT clock_in, clock_out, work_hours FROM EmployeeWorkHours WHERE employee_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeWorkHours WHERE employee_id = 123 ORDER BY clock_in DESC;
SELECT employee_id, work_hours FROM EmployeeWorkHours WHERE work_hours > 8 AND overtime_eligible = true ORDER BY clock_out ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id FROM EmployeeWorkHours WHERE clock_in BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT AVG(work_hours) AS average_work_hours FROM EmployeeWorkHours GROUP BY employee_id HAVING average_work_hours > 6;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeWorkHours WHERE clock_in >= '2022-03-01' AND clock_out <= '2022-03-31' ORDER BY employee_id, clock_in DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employee_Work_Hours WHERE work_hours > 40;
SELECT employee_name, work_hours FROM Employee_Work_Hours WHERE overtime_eligibility = true;
SELECT schedule_id, work_date, start_time, end_time FROM Work_Schedule ORDER BY work_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employee_Work_Hours JOIN Work_Schedule ON Employee_Work_Hours.employee_id = Work_Schedule.employee_id;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_name FROM Employee_Work_Hours WHERE work_hours < 30;
SELECT * FROM Employee_Work_Hours WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, work_hours FROM Employee_Work_Hours WHERE work_hours > 40;
SELECT employee_name, work_hours, overtime_eligibility FROM Employee_Work_Hours WHERE overtime_eligibility = TRUE;
SELECT employee_name, work_hours FROM Employee_Work_Hours ORDER BY work_hours DESC;
SELECT employee_name, work_hours, work_date, start_time, end_time FROM Employee_Work_Hours JOIN Work_Schedule ON Employee_Work_Hours.employee_id = Work_Schedule.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT full_name, hourly_rate FROM Employee;
SELECT * FROM WorkHours WHERE hours_worked > 8;
SELECT full_name, hours_worked FROM Employee JOIN WorkHours ON Employee.employee_id = WorkHours.employee_id;
SELECT work_date, hours_worked FROM WorkHours ORDER BY work_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employee ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, full_name, hourly_rate FROM Employee WHERE hourly_rate > 50.00;
SELECT e.full_name, w.work_date, w.hours_worked FROM Employee e INNER JOIN WorkHours w ON e.employee_id = w.employee_id;
SELECT e.full_name, o.eligible_for_overtime FROM Employee e LEFT JOIN OvertimeEligibility o ON e.employee_id = o.employee_id;
SELECT e.full_name, SUM(w.hours_worked) AS total_hours_worked FROM Employee e INNER JOIN WorkHours w ON e.employee_id = w.employee_id GROUP BY e.full_name ORDER BY total_hours_worked DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employees ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, full_name, position FROM Employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT full_name, position, hourly_rate FROM Employees WHERE hourly_rate > 20.00 ORDER BY hourly_rate DESC;
SELECT employee_id, full_name, position, hourly_rate FROM Employees WHERE position LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY full_name;
SELECT * FROM TimeCards WHERE time_in > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY time_in ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT full_name, position FROM Employees WHERE hourly_rate > 50.00 ORDER BY full_name DESC;

SELECT e.full_name, r.rate_multiplier, l.overtime_hours FROM Employees e JOIN OvertimeRules r ON e.employee_id = r.rule_id JOIN OvertimeLogs l ON e.employee_id = l.employee_id WHERE r.rate_multiplier >= 1.50;
SELECT e.full_name, COUNT(l.log_id) AS total_logs FROM Employees e LEFT JOIN OvertimeLogs l ON e.employee_id = l.employee_id GROUP BY e.full_name HAVING total_logs >= 5;
SELECT e.full_name, t.time_in, t.time_out FROM Employees e JOIN TimeCards t ON e.employee_id = t.employee_id WHERE TIME_TO_SEC(t.time_out) - TIME_TO_SEC(t.time_in) > 3600;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date, department FROM employees WHERE department='HR';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM violation_reports WHERE violation_description LIKE '%harassment%';
SELECT employee_name, work_date, start_time, end_time FROM employees JOIN work_hours ON employees.employee_id = work_hours.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT e.employee_name, w.work_date, w.start_time, w.end_time FROM employees e INNER JOIN work_hours w ON e.employee_id = w.employee_id;
SELECT e.employee_name, o.overtime_eligible FROM employees e INNER JOIN overtime_eligibility o ON e.employee_id = o.employee_id WHERE o.overtime_eligible = TRUE;
